summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; accepting, a $25,000 grant from the Pendleton and Elisabeth Carey Miller Foundation to support the construction of the Meridian Park Playground Renovation Project; increasing the expenditure authority in the Department's 2001 Adopted Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund - Unrestricted Subaccount, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
